actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Reported to House from the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries, H. Rept. 95-784.
Measure laid on table in House, S. 854 passed in lieu.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Commerce to sell two obsolete vessels to Mid-Pacific Sea Harvesters, Inc., and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Commerce to sell two obsolete vessels to a certain corporation.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Commerce to sell two obsolete vessels to Mid-Pacific Sea Harvesters, Inc., and for other purposes.
